title: 36-24-34: How Far Should Celebrities Go For “Art” and "Beauty"?
itunes:title: 36-24-34: How Far Should Celebrities Go For “Art” and "Beauty"?
itunes:subtitle: Tackling Kim Kardashian in that Marilyn Monroe dress and how far should we go for beauty
description:
This week the basic and the brain are tackling Kim Kardashian's recent response to the backlash she received for losing an unhealthy amount of weight ahead of the Met Gala in order to fit the classic and timeless museum piece (a former Marilyn Monroe dress). Now that we know the dress was actually damaged and that her weight loss didn't help with maintaining the integrity of the original, we discuss how far is too far when celebrities transform for the "art form" and for beauty. We talk insecurities, the dangers of celebrities trying to be "relatable" when they live very different lives with VERY different financial standings and how much of dieting culture has permeated the fabric of our society.



Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
